sentences.en: a deep split within the government
sentences.cn: 政府内部很深的分歧

sentences.en: A number of bags had split and were spilling their contents.
sentences.cn: 有几只袋子裂开了，里面的东西撒了出来。

sentences.en: Did the two of you split up in the woods?
sentences.cn: 你们俩是在树林里分开的吗？

sentences.en: Don't split hairs. You know what I'm getting at.
sentences.cn: 别钻牛角尖了。你知道我指什么。

sentences.en: Even though we split up she was blooming marvellous.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们分手了，但她确实很了不起。

sentences.en: He had a split lip and an eye that wouldn't open properly.
sentences.cn: 他长着兔唇，一只眼睛无法正常睁开。

sentences.en: He patented the idea that the atom could be split.
sentences.cn: 他获得了“原子可以再分”这一概念的专利权。

sentences.en: Her company has had to split up and work from two locations.
sentences.cn: 她的公司不得不被拆开，分在两处办公。

sentences.en: I didn't want to use my married name because we've split.
sentences.cn: 我不想用我的夫姓，因为我们已经离婚了。

sentences.en: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.cn: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

sentences.en: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.cn: 在一次大风中，船断成了两截。

sentences.en: It was feared that the issue would split the church.
sentences.cn: 人们担心这一问题会导致教会分裂。

sentences.en: My cuticles were split and ragged, and my nails unevenly bitten.
sentences.cn: 我指甲根部的表皮龟裂粗糙，指甲被咬得参差不齐。

sentences.en: One of the boxes had split open .
sentences.cn: 其中一个盒子裂开了。

sentences.en: Schizophrenia is not a "split mind" as is popularly believed.
sentences.cn: 精神分裂症并非人们普遍认为的那样是“分裂的精神”。

sentences.en: Soldiers had to make split-second decisions before opening fire, he said.
sentences.cn: 他说，士兵们必须要在开火之前作出瞬间的决定。

sentences.en: Split the pineapple down the middle .
sentences.cn: 把菠萝从中间切开。

sentences.en: The argument could lead to a damaging split in the party.
sentences.cn: 这场争吵可能会导致党内出现分裂，对该党产生不利影响。

sentences.en: The branch split under their weight.
sentences.cn: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.en: the dynamic comedy duo will have you splitting your sides with laughter.
sentences.cn: 这一对生气勃勃的喜剧搭档能让你笑破肚皮。

sentences.en: The region was split three ways, between Greece, Serbia and Bulgaria.
sentences.cn: 这一地区被希腊、塞尔维亚和保加利亚分成了3部分。

sentences.en: The school occupies split-site accommodation on the main campus.
sentences.cn: 该学院分散在主校区不同地点。

sentences.en: They agreed to split the bill down the middle.
sentences.cn: 他们同意均摊费用。

sentences.en: We agreed to split the cost .
sentences.cn: 我们同意分摊这笔费用。

words.tran_cn: 极快的；爆裂似的，剧烈的；滑稽的
分离机，分流器；分解器，拆分器

phrases.tran_cn: 香蕉圣代（剖开香蕉夹以冰淇淋等）；香蕉半剖条
发现或找出细微的差距

phrases.phrase: split one's sides (北美亦作split a gut)

phrases.tran_cn: 取两个数量的平均值，折中
(美)投一个以上党派的候选人的票
（候选人，小党派）吸引另一候选人或党派的选票造成两败俱伤而使第三者胜出

trans.tran_en: a tear or crack in something made of cloth, wood etc
to divide or separate something into different parts or groups, or to be divided into different parts or groups

trans.tran_cn: <俚>走开，揭发，被撞碎，<美>[证券]（股票）增加发行
trans.tran_en: if a group of people splits, or if it is split, people in the group disagree strongly with each other and the group sometimes divides into separate smaller groups

trans.tran_cn: 分裂，分开，<俚>（迅速）离开，分担
trans.tran_en: if something splits, or if you split it, it tears or breaks along a straight line
if something splits, or if you split it, it tears or breaks along a straight line
